mapper.select: SELECT TU.ID, TU.USER_NAME, TU.USER_IMG_NAME, TU.USER_IMG_PATH, TU.USER_BACKGROUND_IMG_NAME, TU.USER_BACKGROUND_IMG_PATH, TU.USER_ART_CATEGORY, TUS.UNIVERSITY_NAME FROM TBL_USER TU JOIN TBL_MAJOR TM ON TU.MAJOR_ID = TM.ID JOIN TBL_UNIVERSITY TUS ON TM.UNIVERSITY_ID = TUS.ID WHERE TU.ID = #{userId} AND TU.USER_WRITER_STATUS = '승인'

SELECT TU.ID, TU.USER_NAME, TU.USER_IMG_NAME, TU.USER_IMG_PATH, TU.USER_BACKGROUND_IMG_NAME, TU.USER_BACKGROUND_IMG_PATH, TU.USER_ART_CATEGORY, TUS.UNIVERSITY_NAME FROM TBL_USER TU JOIN TBL_MAJOR TM ON TU.MAJOR_ID = TM.ID JOIN TBL_UNIVERSITY TUS ON TM.UNIVERSITY_ID = TUS.ID WHERE TU.USER_WRITER_STATUS = '승인' AND TU.ID != #{userId}
AND TU.USER_ART_CATEGORY = '공예'
AND TU.USER_ART_CATEGORY = '건축'
AND TU.USER_ART_CATEGORY = '서예'
AND TU.USER_ART_CATEGORY = '회화'
AND TU.USER_ART_CATEGORY = '조각'
AND TU.USER_ART_CATEGORY = '한국화'
AND TU.USER_ART_CATEGORY = '한국화'
AND TU.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY TU.USER_NAME
ORDER BY TU.ID
ORDER BY TU.ID
ASC
DESC
OFFSET (#{cursor} - 1) * 15 ROWS FETCH NEXT 15 ROWS ONLY

mapper.select: SELECT TU.USER_IMG_NAME, TU.USER_IMG_PATH, TU.USER_NAME, TUN.UNIVERSITY_NAME, TU.USER_INSTAGRAM, TU.USER_BLOG, TU.USER_YOUTUBE, TU.USER_INTRODUCE, TU.USER_ART_CATEGORY, TH.HISTORY_DATE, TH.HISTORY_CONTENT FROM TBL_USER TU LEFT JOIN TBL_MAJOR TM ON TU.MAJOR_ID = TM.ID JOIN TBL_UNIVERSITY TUN ON TM.UNIVERSITY_ID = TUN.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_HISTORY TH ON TU.ID = TH.USER_ID WHERE TU.ID = #{userId}

SELECT TA.ID, AI.ART_IMG_NAME, AI.ART_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_ART TA JOIN ( SELECT AI1.ART_ID, AI1.ART_IMG_NAME, AI1.ART_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_ART_IMG AI1 JOIN ( SELECT ART_ID, MIN(ID) AS MIN_ID FROM TBL_ART_IMG GROUP BY ART_ID ) AI2 ON AI1.ART_ID = AI2.ART_ID AND AI1.ID = AI2.MIN_ID ) AI ON TA.ID = AI.ART_ID WHERE TA.USER_ID = #{userId}
